name: PING Integrated Patient SMS Support
short_description:
This project is the base SMS management software that for a multiple support systems for targeted Clients. The modules are broken down as follows:

1) Kgakololo: Clients can be setup to receive timed reminders to take medication and appointment reminders as well. 

2). SMC: Clients will receive pre and post operative messages containing informative reminders as well as general reminders for follow up appointments.

3). Client referral: This module will allow tracking of patients after they have been tested until they receive treatment at specified clinics.

4). Lab test results: This module allow specific lab tests to be entered and sent out to SMS printers at the specified facilities.
summary: The management software for the PING SMS support systems.
